meanings.sent1: She is modernizing her wardrobe by adding trendy pieces.
meanings.sent2: The company is modernizing its manufacturing process to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: John joked that he was modernizing his cooking skills by using a microwave.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were modernizing like a chameleon changing colors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's innovative methods of modernizing the curriculum made learning exciting.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something up-to-date with modern technology or practices.
meanings.sent1: The modernizing of the school's computer systems was a big project.
meanings.sent2: Many businesses are investing in modernizing to stay competitive.
meanings.sent3: The modernizing of the old building turned it into a high-tech marvel.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas for modernizing the office were like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The modernizing of the transportation system improved the daily commute for many.
